entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early in the morning. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 1 April 2023
